get.description: Retrieves a value from the TableRow's specified column. The column may be specified by either its ID or title.

getNum.description: Retrieves a Float value from the TableRow's specified column. The column may be specified by either its ID or title.

getString.description: Retrieves an String value from the TableRow's specified column. The column may be specified by either its ID or title.

set.description: Stores a value in the TableRow's specified column. The column may be specified by either its ID or title.

setNum.description: Stores a Float value in the TableRow's specified column. The column may be specified by either its ID or title.

setString.description: Stores a String value in the TableRow's specified column. The column may be specified by either its ID or title.
